author: A_Brickset_user
review: It was sort of hard at the beginning, but after that it turned into a very fun game. You travel to different islands to track down the Brickster who escaped from jail AGAIN. Islands other than the main one, LEGO Island include Castle and Adventurers isles. You play differnt subgames like jousts, races agianst time, freeing dinosaurs, whacka snake, and so on.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: 2nd best lego comuter game. Awesome, nnone the less.
review:
My 1st favorite game is LEGO Island.

Good games

Cons:

author: BrikmanMcStudz
title: LOVE THIS GAME!

So yeah, LEGO Island 2
Great game

storyline

Cons:

I hate that prissy Pete Bog

author: legoindyfan
title: 'An Island of LEGO, a World of LEGO, a World that I like!
review: I got this from a friend of my mom, and I like it! Shame that I didn't get the Brickster Key chain, because the friend of my mom probably has it. I like it very much, and you can easy involve into the story.

author: Bricknave
title: Mini-game adventure
review:
In the first LEGO Island game; you cruise around building pre-made things, customizing things and playing mini-games whenever you felt like it.  This has a lot more action and adventure than the previous one.

Pros:
Better graphics!
Better music!
You see your character in front of you instead of through the eye-view thing!
Better controls!
Chatting with characters is better!
Awesome mini-games!
You can visit different areas based on different LEGO themes!
Collectibles that give you points
You can customize hats, vehicles and scenery!

Cons:
You can't build anything.
You can't get to where Johnny Thunder is when you revisit Adventurers island.
Not a lot of things to do after you beat the game, except discover the secret of the cave near the space port ....

4/5

~Bricknave

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Video Games/PC) - LEGO Island 2 Review
review:
This is the second LEGO Island videogame which is a really cool game to have. The new island looks much cooler than in the first part and the game has lot's of little games in it, too. What I also like about this game is that some of the missions are not only on LEGO Island. There're also some missions which includes themes like Adventurers and Castle (Knights' Kingdom I). However: The final world is the Ogel Island but it's not based on the Alpha Team theme.

Pros

  • Lot's of cool games
  • New layout of the island
  • Missions includes themes like Adventurers and Castle (Knights' Kingdom I)
  • Cool Music

Cons

  • There're some buildings in this game which LEGO never produced as a set

Summary

All in all it's a great game to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.

author: BIONICLEGuy
title: Improvement!
review:
In case you haven't read my review of LEGO Island click here. Okay, lets go.

All the bad things about LEGO Island have been taken into account and have been sorted out. However, some more bad things have popped up......


Pros.

Game after Brickster escapes is easier than the near-impossible original Brickster levels.

Save files make a welcome debut.

Widely bigger than the original, with 3 islands to explore.

Helicopter, cars and skateboards are all playable again.....

Cons.

.....no jet-ski though.

4 playable LEGO people have been removed, leaving only Pepper. Actually, that's no bad thing.....

Absurd loading times.


A much better game than the original, if you put up with the cons. Two of the three actually depend on the first game, so if you haven't played it this is fine!
